page.title: 16McCowans and Sons
page.content: One{industry}expanding rapidly is McCowan & Sons Ltd.,a local{ {confectionary}business,started in 1924 and now owned by Nestles.There are 150 employees and more are likely to be taken on soon if demand continues to grow. The factory is working a 24 hour day and has excellent{labour} relations.The nearest school,Stenhousemuir primary also has a very good working relationship with the factory,trial sampling their products,inventing new names and in turn,having very enjoyable and informative{tours}of the factory. There is no chatting on the factory tour.The little jaws are too busy chewing."Wham bars are made from a big bulge of pink gooey stuff rolled out flat by machine then cut up...."at the rate of 264,000 per day.
